articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Sin Yong Ae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Sin Yong Ae
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of Prof. and Dr. Sin Yong Ae, a teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: MOU between Governments of DPRK and Malaysia Signed
articles.content:
MOU between Governments of DPRK and Malaysia Signed
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A MOU on cooperation in the fields of culture, arts and heritage between the governments of the DPRK and Malaysia was signed.
					 It was signed by Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and Dato Sri Mohamed Nazri Bin Abdul Aziz, minister of Tourism and Culture of Malaysia.

articles.title: All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Issues Joint Press Release
articles.content:
All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Issues Joint Press Release
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration issued the following joint press release on Wednesday:
					 A meeting of chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was held in Shenyang, China from February 7 to 8, 2017, amid the great expectation and concern of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The meeting discussed practical matters for improving the north-south relations and opening up a new phase of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans this significant year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, and agreed as follows:
					
					1. June 15 All-Korean Committee agreed to respect the agreements common to the nation including the three principles of national reunification and the north-south declarations and, on this basis, promote the national reconciliation and unity and pro-actively spur the movement for peace of the country and improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					2. June 15 All-Korean Committee agreed to conduct diverse activities for defusing military tension and the danger of war and building a lasting and durable peace mechanism on the Korean peninsula.
					
					3. June 15 All-Korean Committee agreed to set the days from June 15 to October 4 as a period of marking the publication of the north-south declarations and hold events common to the nation in Pyongyang, Seoul and other areas in the north and the south on the occasions of June 15, July 4, August 15 and October 4, anniversaries common to the nation, in order to realize visits, contacts, dialogue and exchanges between people of all social standings in the north and the south and abroad and revitalize the reunification movement nationwide.
					
					4. June 15 All-Korean Committee decided to certainly hold a pan-national grand gathering for reunification attended by all political parties, organizations and compatriots at home and abroad including the authorities of the north and the south and play its key and pioneer role in opening up the second June 15 era of reunification.
					
					5. June 15 All-Korean Committee decided to strive for the successful holding of reunification gathering, sports and cultural events and seminars, etc. involving people of all social strata, fields and organizations such as the north-south workers' football games for reunification, north-south farmers' national folk and cultural events for reunification, north-south-overseas youth and students' grand gathering for reunification, meeting of representatives of women's organizations, meeting of north-south religionists, tour of historical sites related to the anti-Japanese independence movement.
					
					6. June 15 All-Korean Committee decided to make efforts for diverse sports and cultural exchange on the occasion of the 2018 women's Asian Cup and the 23rd Winter Olympiad.
					
					7. June 15 All-Korean Committee decided to wrest apology and reparation for all the crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation in the past and conduct more dynamic solidarity activities for the democratic rights of the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international bodies here visited the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Wednesday with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid bouquets at the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung among reeling workers and leader Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the mill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round different parts of the mill, including the room for education in the revolutionary history, the silk reeling shop and the workers' hostel. 
					
					 They also toured the Pyongyang Bag Factory on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded and developed the revolutionary armed forces on the occasion of the birthday of the regular armed forces.
					 Many servicepersons, citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets, together with bouquets, in the names of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and organs, industrial establishments at all levels and schools in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 The visitors made deep bows before the statues, looking back upon the exploits of the great leaders who developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular armed forces and ushered in a golden age of development of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Also, an endless stream of visitors flew to the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Servicepersons, civilians and school youth and children in different parts of the country, too, paid floral tribute to the statues of the great leaders and the mosaics depicting their smiling images in their residential areas.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Service Personnel
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Service Personnel
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK sponsored a dancing party on Tuesday on the lapse of 69 years since the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 When the dancing party started amid the playing of the song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", its participants unfolded a sea of cheerful dances, recollecting the exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 "Korean People's Army, Paektusan Army," "At a Go" and other songs were played at the venue of the dancing party, reflecting the heroic spirit of the KPA.
					
					 They cheerfully danced to the melodies of such songs as "Song of Pride Guards Units" and "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front."
					
					 "We Will Follow Our Party Forever" and "We Will Go to Mt Paektu" revved up the festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday, the 69th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremony were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff; and commanding officers and soldiers of the KPA.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, KPA units at all levels and military academies were laid at the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes".
					
					 The visitors paid silent tribute in memory of the martyrs of the KPA and went round the cemetery.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon Qualifiers Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon Qualifiers Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon Qualifiers was held in different parts of the country, including Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Hamhung and Chongjin.
					 The contest was held, divided into 45 km and 30 km races.
					
					 Pak Chol from the Sajabong Sports Team and Kim Hye Gyong from the Pyongyang Sports Team won men's and women's 45 km races and male runners from the Amnokgang Sports Team and female runners from the Sobaeksu Sports Team and the sports team of Pyongyang University of Railways 30 km race in Pyongyang.
					
					 Such races took place in other cities and a number of men and women runners were qualified for the 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Wednesday in celebration of the historic day when President Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces. 
					 Dancing parties began when "Song of the Korean People's Army" resounded forth at plazas in Pyongyang including those of the Monument to Party Founding and the Arch of Triumph. 
					
					 The participants cheerfully danced, extending eternal glory to the President who provided a powerful military guarantee for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They danced to the tune of such songs as "Fortune of Korea" and "Our General Is the Best" expressing boundless reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who developed the Korean People's Army into the matchless elite combat force and put the DPRK on the status of self-defensive military power and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 They also reflected the pride and honor of holding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday for building the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The atmosphere of the dancing parties revved up when "Song of Youth," "Let Us Meet on the Front" and other songs were played. 
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties across the country.

articles.title: National Calligraphy Festival Opens
articles.content:
National Calligraphy Festival Opens
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A national calligraphy festival was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Wednesday in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Seen at the venue of the festival is Korean painting "Meeting young wit" depicting President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il seeing calligraphy skill of a schoolgirl with broad smiles on their faces.
					
					 Displayed at the festival are at least 300 pieces of calligraphic work dealing with aphorisms of the great leaders and new contemporary words in the Songun era, famous compositions and lyric passages written by calligraphers and calligraphy lovers with diverse strokes through their creative activities and at work sites. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned, creators, calligraphy lovers, school youth and children and citizens.

articles.title: National Seminar Held
articles.content:
National Seminar Held
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday to deeply grasp the great feats of leader Kim Jong Il for the building of a socialist power and further glorify them through a drive to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and the officials of party and administrative organs, working people's organizations, scientific, educational, literary and art and media organs, party cadres training institutions and the field of preservation of revolutionary relics in Pyongyang.
					
					 The seminar heard papers on the tasks and ways for achieving rapid progress in the drive to implement the decision of the Seventh WPK Congress, regarding Kim Jong Il's exploits for the socialist cause of Juche and his behests as lifeline.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the great Paektusan nation as he gave steady continuity to the lineage of the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 They stressed it is a brilliant fruition of his superhuman patriotic devotion that the national strength of the DPRK has been put on the highest level at present.
					
					 He trained the soldiers and civilians to be persons with strong mental power and firm faith in socialism, they said, adding the new era of building a socialist power is a precious outcome of his patriotic devotion.
					
					 They contended that it is the noblest duty of the Korean people to speed up the victorious advance of socialism by implementing Kim Jong Il's behests to the letter.

articles.title: Revolutionary Site in Mt Jangja Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Site in Mt Jangja Draws Many Visitors
Kanggye, February 8 (KCNA) -- Service persons, workers, youths and students of the DPRK are visiting the Revolutionary Site in Mt Jangja in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The site is where Kim Jong Il stayed for over 20 days in October Juche 39 (1950), wishing President Kim Il Sung good health and cultivating his noble will to bring about the future of the triumphant country by wiping out the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 After being briefed about the monument to the revolutionary history, the visitors went round the house where Kim Jong Il stayed, and historic relics preserved there.
					
					 They also looked round the study site, where he helped his comrades prepare themselves to be revolutionary persons of talent, and other places.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (4)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (4)
Ever-victorious Naval Force of the DPRK
					
					 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung directed efforts to found the modern naval force of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 In June Juche 35 (1946), he organized the maritime security force. And he took measures to train naval commanding officers versed in expert skills. He also paid deep attention to the building of warships.
					
					 On this basis, he declared the foundation of the KPA Navy on August 28, 1949. 
					
					 The KPA Navy worked such military miracle as sinking the U.S. heavy cruiser Baltimore and destroying a light cruiser with a few torpedo boats in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 In the 1960s, the KPA Navy captured the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo, which intruded into the territorial water of the DPRK.
					
					 The KPA naval force, founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung, could have remained ever-victorious under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ordinary marines rushed into the raging flames to save the trees bearing slogans, eternal assets of the Korean revolution, with their lives and reliably defended the territorial waters of the country by displaying the spirit of becoming human bullets and bombs, the self-blasting spirit, in battles against enemy.
					
					 As the KPA upholds respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander, the naval force equipped with modern offensive and defensive means will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (5)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (5)
Air Corps, Elite Force of Korean People's Army
					
					 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- It has been nearly 70 years since the air force was organized for the first time in the DPRK.
					
					 On November 29, Juche 34 (1945), President Kim Il Sung visited the Sinuiju Aviation Association and delivered a speech "Let Us Create the Air Force of the New Korea".
					
					 In the speech, he put stress on the significance and importance of the creation of the air force in building a national regular army and indicated in detail the orientation and ways for creating the air force of the new Korea.
					
					 He took measures to organize the Korean Aviation Association (KAA) by merging branches of the Sinuiju Aviation Association in Hamhung, Chongjin, Hoeryong and other areas into one.
					
					 The President personally took the chairmanship of the KAA and wisely led the work to build a regular air force.
					
					 He also took measures to organize an air training class at the Pyongyang Institute to train elite young men into pilots, maintenance men and signalmen.
					
					 Under his guidance, the first air corps was created on August 20, 1947 with graduates from the Pyongyang Institute and air technicians.
					
					 In the Fatherland Liberation War, pilots of the Korean People's Army (KPA) shot down B-29s, which the U.S. imperialists boasted themselves as "flying fortress", and dashed their planes against enemy warships.
					
					 During the Vietnam War, they shot down the U.S. imperialists' latest-type planes.
					
					 In defending the socialist motherland, the KPA air force shot down the U.S. spying plane "EC-121" and drove "RC-135" away when they violated the airspace of the DPRK.
					
					 Now, the KPA air force is reliably defending the territorial sky of the country under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who ushers in a golden era of Juche-oriented army building.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean PM's Greed for Power
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean PM's Greed for Power
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, has openly revealed his intent to run for the next term "presidency."
					 Hwang had said that he had "no will to run for presidential election" until the end of the last year. But he suddenly made a U-turn this year. He is running helter-skelter to gain public support, asserting "economy and people's living constitute a top priority task" and calling for "people's unity and integration" at various meetings such as "meeting to start new year work" chaired by him.
					
					 He has worked hard to rally the conservative forces and win over more forces supportive of the regime by hyping "security crisis." At the same time, he kept himself busy with diplomacy towards the U.S. as evidenced by his zealous support for the U.S. THAAD deployment and a phone conversation with the new U.S. president to please his master.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the conservative forces seek to realize their stay in power at any cost by putting forward the guy seized with his wild ambition for power, calling for helping Hwang run for the "presidency."
					
					 As seen above, Hwang, an arch criminal who deserves punishment by history, is running amuck to make the second Park Geun Hye regime appear by taking advantage of the impeachment trial in south Korea, not content with the office of the acting president. This is a challenge and insult to the public candlelight actions sweeping south Korea.
					
					 Being puppet minister of Justice and prime minister as a special confidant of Park, Hwang had always acted at her beck and call. He is a leading accomplice in the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil Scandal."
					
					 While working as a public prosecutor of the Seoul District Prosecutor's Office, section chief of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office and chief public prosecutor at the Pusan High Public Prosecutor's Office for 30 odd years, he had mercilessly suppressed the progressive pro-reunification forces by invoking the ill-famed "Security Law".
					
					 In particular, Hwang took the lead in cooking up hideous conspiratorial cases at the instructions of Park when he was minister of Justice. It is well illustrated by the fact that he masterminded the operations to sweep under carpet the case of Intelligence Service's interference in the election and the case of Jong Yun Hoe's interference in "state affairs", cook up the spy case of a public worker in Seoul City, forcibly dissolve the Unified Progressive Party and check the probe into the truth behind the ferry "Sewol" disaster.
					
					 He also took the lead in enforcing Park's country-selling policies like introduction of "state-compiled history textbooks", decision on THAAD deployment and the agreement on sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army, which brought unbearable disgrace and humiliation to south Korea.
					
					 It is natural that opposition parties and civic organizations of south Korea are strongly urging Hwang to make an apology and step down as early as possible, branding him as "servant of Park's regime" and the "guy akin to Park."
					
					 Foolhardy are the conservatives of south Korea who have gone so foolish as to try to stay in power by pinning hope even on the top class accomplice forsaken by the people. 
					
					 Hwang would be well advised to go to jail with Park, aware of where he is standing.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Is Bound to Perish: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Is Bound to Perish: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea fated to be ousted from Chongwadae due to the unprecedented anti-"government" resistance is making desperate efforts to prolong its remaining days.
					 As the days go by, traitor Park Geun Hye is denying all her crimes, refusing to comply with the demand of the constitutional court. She employs "tactics" of delaying the decision on her impeachment, running the whole gamut of sleight hand to overturn the trial and special investigation through dozens of witnesses.
					
					 Park was loud-mouthed about "plots," jabbering that "it seemed somebody planned it from long ago" and "the scandal is a high mountain of lies," far from making any reflection and apology for the extra-large political scandal. Meanwhile, Choe Sun Sil went the lengths of behaving so inanely as asserting "false charge."
					
					 These ridiculous behaviors only touch off bitterer resentment among south Korean people from all walks of life at Park Geun Hye as they are nothing but last-ditch efforts of those criminals fear-stricken by the fast approaching severe punishment by the people.
					
					 At present no one can pardon or overlook the disgusting behavior of Park, disgrace and tragedy of the nation.
					
					 The ruin of the Park Geun Hye group is the deserved punishment meted out to the top-class traitors by the people for having committed the thrice-cursed crimes against the people, the nation and reunification during their office.
					
					 Depending on outside forces, this group of traitors sold out the dignity and interests of the nation and brought the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and blocked democratization of the south Korean society.
					
					 In collusion with outsiders, they monopolized vested rights of the south Korean society and held privileged position and accumulated huge wealth by pursuing all sorts of unpopular policies. Owing to these pro-U.S. conservative forces, the whole society in south Korea has been thrown into unprecedented terror, instability and chaos and it is torn with such social and political disputes and violence as the "system of introducing state-compiled history textbooks" aiming at the revival of "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 The tragic end of the Park Geun Hye regime is the inevitable product of the corrupt political system of south Korea, the only U.S. colony of modern version on the earth.
					
					 The prolongation of traitor Park's life would only deepen the social chaos and further deteriorate the people's living and bring unbearable pain to the south Korean people and all other Koreans.
					
					 The time to oust Park from Chongwadae is close at hand.
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life out in the struggle to eliminate all social evils with candlelight of justice will never cease their actions till they attain their goals.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Assertion about Tok Islets
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Assertion about Tok Islets
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the foreign minister of Japan in the new year diplomatic speech at the Diet again made reckless remarks that Tok islets belong to "territory of Japan". 
					 Earlier, when referring to the issue of south Korea's erecting a girl statue, symbol of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, in Tok islets he let out a flurry of diatribe that "Takeshima (Tok islets) is part of the inviolable territory of Japan and therefore, Seoul's claim is unacceptable from this stand." 
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary terms the Japanese reactionaries' assertions about Tok islets a blatant challenge and violation of the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 It is indisputable that Tok islets are part of inviolable territory of Korea in the light of historical facts and from the geographical point of view and from the viewpoint of international law, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 From the ethic and moral viewpoint, Japan should kneel down before the Korean nation and make honest apology and reparation for the crimes it committed in the past.
					
					 It is the cunning calculation of the Japanese reactionaries to evade the responsibility to redress their past crimes by creating complexity over the issue of Tok islets and glossing over it.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that Japan seeks to serve double purposes to find a pretext of staging a comeback to Korea in contingency by deliberately sparking a territorial dispute.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' claim to Tok islets can never come true as it is not worth consideration. 
					
					 They would be well advised to clearly understand the Korean people's will to defend Tok islets and drop their daydream.

articles.title: Halt to THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and other organizations of south Korea reportedly held a press conference outside the puppet defense ministry building on February 3 in protest against the deployment of war hardware.
					 Speakers at the conference said that during his visit to south Korea the U.S. secretary of Defense claimed THAAD deployment is needed to "cope with the DPRK's nukes", but it has been already proved that the deployment has nothing to do with defending south Korea.
					
					 They contended that the THAAD deployment would bring benefits only to the U.S. and Japan and it is not helpful to peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They urged the authorities to stop the THAAD deployment inviting war.

articles.title: S. Korea: Puppet Group Hit for Disturbing Probe into Truth behind Scandal
articles.content:
S. Korea: Puppet Group Hit for Disturbing Probe into Truth behind Scandal
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- South Korea's CBS on Feb. 6 denounced the puppet group of traitors for disturbing the probe into the truth behind the hideous scandal.
					 The broadcasting said that the decision on impeachment at the "Constitutional Court" and the special investigation are met with obstacles owing to the intentional delay by Chongwadae.
					
					 If Chongwadae refuses to accept the search by the special investigation, the "president" should be summoned to the prosecution office as ordinary criminal and be severely punished, it noted.

articles.title: Communist Party of Soviet Union to Mark Day of Shinning Star
articles.content:
Communist Party of Soviet Union to Mark Day of Shinning Star
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A joint committee involving representatives of political parties and organizations under the Communist Party of the Soviet Union was formed on January 30 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The joint committee chaired by Mojgovoy, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Soviet Union and chairman of the International Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party", is composed of representatives of the Communist Workers Party of Russia, the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan, the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and other parties and organizations.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was formed in Norway on January 25.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was inaugurated in Helsinki, Finland on January 22.
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksi, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange various political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Indonesian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Indonesian Political Figure
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on Jan. 30 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Noting that they look back on the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary, the statement said:
					
					 With his distinguished Songun politics, HE Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power no formidable enemy can provoke.
					
					 He was a genuine tender-hearted father of the people as he had dedicated his all to their well-being till the last moments of his life.
					
					 He also made great contributions to the development of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK and to the world peace and security.
					
					 His exploits for the times and history will be always kept in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por deceso de Sin Yong Ae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por deceso de Sin Yong Ae
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 7 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la Prof y Dr. Sin Yong Ae, profesora de la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Efectuado el acto de MINFAP por el 8 de febrero
articles.content:
Efectuado el acto de MINFAP por el 8 de febrero
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 el acto del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares para festejar el 69o aniversario del fortalecimiento y desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como fuerzas armadas regulares por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y otros comandantes y militares del EPC.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Hwang Pyong So quien dijo como sigue:
					
					El fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del ERPC como fuerzas armadas regulares significan la victoria de la idea y linea sobre el particular, presentadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung a base de la inmortal idea Juche, la de Songun.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il propuso como mision general de la construccion militar la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo y consolido el EPC como ejercito infinitamente fiel al Lider y el Partido.
					
					Con la voluntad invariable de transformar el EPC como eterno ejercito del Presidente y el Dirigente, el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un defiende y glorifica con la incansable direccion las hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales realizadas en la construccion militar.
					
					Todos deben luchar intensamente por aumentar el poderio militar bajo la bandera de la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo siguiendo la direccion del Comandante Supremo sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, de modo que se levantara en la tierra patria la potencia socialista, reunificada y prospera como deseaban los lideres antecesores.
					
					Deben mantener el estado de alerta conforme a la demanda de la situacion creada y aniquilar las guaridas de agresion con implacable ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo si los enemigos se atreven a atentar, aunque en lo minimo, contra nuestra soberania y dignidad, cumpliendo asi la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Publicado comunicado conjunto
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado conjunto
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En medio de la gran esperanza y atencion interior y exterior de Corea tuvo lugar del 7 al 8 de febrero de 2017 en Shenyang de China la reunion de los presidentes de las partes nortena, surena y ultramarina del Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					En el foro discutieron los problemas practicos para unir las fuerzas de toda la nacion a fin de mejorar las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur y abrir nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente en el presente ano en que se cumplen el 45o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio y el 10o de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y acordaron como lo siguiente:
					
					1.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio respetara los acuerdos comunes de la nacion incluyendo los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y las declaraciones Norte-Sur y, basandose en ello, promovera la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales e impulsara activamente la paz del pais y la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					2.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio desplegara diversas actividades para eliminar la tension militar y el peligro de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y establecer el permanente y solido sistema de la paz.
					
					3.  A fin de realizar el viaje y el contacto, el dialogo y el intercambio entre distintos sectores del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar y dinamizar el movimiento de reunificacion en la esfera nacional el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio definio el periodo desde el dia 15 de junio hasta el 4 de octubre como el de conmemorar la publicacion de las declaraciones N-S y acordo realizar los actos conjuntos nacionales en las regiones del Norte y el Sur inclusive Pyongyang y Seul con motivo del 15 de junio, el 4 de julio, el 15 de agosto y el 4 de octubre, que son efemerides conjuntas de la nacion.
					
					4.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio realizara sin falta este ano la gran conferencia pannacional de reunificacion en que participen las autoridades, los partidos politicos y entidades del Norte y el Sur de Corea y los compatriotas de diversos estratos en el ultramar y asi cumplira el papel iniciativo y vanguardista en abrir la segunda epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio.
					
					5.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio se esforzara activamente por la realizacion exitosa de los encuentros, los actos deportivos y culturales y los seminarios de todos los sectores, dominios y entidades, incluso el partido de futbol de reunificacion de los obreros del Norte y el Sur, el acto folclorico y cultural de los campesinos de ambas partes coreanas, el gran conclave de los jovenes y estudiantes del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar, la conferencia de representantes de las entidades de mujeres, la reunion de religiosos del Norte y el Sur, la marcha a los lugares de interes historico de los movimientos antijaponeses y por la independencia, etc.
					
					6.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio se esforzara por la efectuacion de diversos intercambios deportivos y culturales con motivo del Campeonato de Futbol Femenino por la Copa Asiatica 2018 y los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					7.  El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio dinamizara mas las actividades solidarias para que Japon pida perdon y haga la recompensacion a la nacion coreana por sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado y para obtener todos los derechos democraticos de los coreanos residentes en Japon.

articles.title: Portavoz de Comite de Juristas de Corea condena a reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Portavoz de Comite de Juristas de Corea condena a reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Juristas de Corea publico el dia 7 una declaracion en relacion con que en el Ano Nuevo, los reaccionarios japoneses recrudecen su campana para acabar con la educacion nacional democratica de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					El documento se refirio a que el 26 de enero, el tribunal local de Osaka de Japon justifico la medida de la autoridad administrativa de la region, que excluyo la Escuela Coreana de Osaka de la lista de pago de fondos necesarios para la educacion, y tomo la mala decision de denegar la justa demanda de esa escuela.
					
					Esta clara la siniestra intencion de los reaccionarios japoneses que como si fuera poco la campana de sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), echan sus garras hasta en la sagrada educacion nacional sumandose a la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC, asi senalo el portavoz y continuo:
					
					Al suspender el pago de fondos, ellos intentan presionar en lo psicologico a los padres de alumnos coreanos al imponerles la carga financiera y a la larga, separarlos del regazo de la RPDC y la Chongryon.
					
					Tanto en vista de los crimenes cometidos en el pasado por el imperialismo japones contra el pueblo coreano como a la luz de la ley nacional de Japon, las autoridades japonesas tienen la responsabilidad moral y legal de respetar y asegurar el derecho a la educacion nacional de los coreanos residentes en su pais.
					
					El veredicto del tribunal de Osaka deviene un crimen antietico e inhumanitario que contraviene totalmente a la convencion internacional de DDHH que exige asegurar a los extranjeros el igual derecho a la educacion.
					
					La conducta de reaccionarios japoneses hace recordar el escalofriante crimen cometido en el pasado por los imperialistas del mismo pais que sonando con el exterminio de la nacion coreana, trato de eliminar la lengua, la letra, el apellido y el nombre de los coreanos.
					
					La sucia campana de ellos esta multiplicando el odio y el revanchismo implacable del pueblo coreano contra Japon, enemigo jurado.
					
					Los reaccionarios del pais isla deben parar de inmediato sus injustos actos de discriminacion sobre la educacion nacional de los coreanos en Japon y responsabilizarse de todas las consecuencias.

articles.title: Minju Joson refuta disparates del canciller japones sobre el islote Tok
articles.content:
Minju Joson refuta disparates del canciller japones sobre el islote Tok
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Al pronunciar hace poco el llamado discurso de diplomacia del Ano Nuevo en la Dieta, el canciller japones dijo atrevidamente que el islote Tok es un "territorio jurisdiccional de Japon". Con anterioridad, expreso que no puede admitir que el Sur de Corea levante en el islote Tok una estatua de nina, simbolo de victimas de la esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, diciendo que "desde el principio, Takeshima (nombre japones del Tok) es un territorio propio de su pais".
					El dia 8, el rotativo Minju Joson hizo publico un comentario individual calificando tales palabras de un desafio y violacion flagrante de la soberania y dignidad de la nacion coreana.
					
					El comentarista subrayo que tanto en lo historico y geologico como en vista del derecho internacional, es indiscutible que el islote Tok sea un territorio propio de Corea, y continuo:
					
					Desde el punto de vista etico y moral, Japon debe pedir disculpas de rodillas a la nacion coreana por su pasado lleno de crimenes e indemnizarlos suficientemente.
					
					Japon trata de liberarse de la responsabilidad de su historia criminal al complicar el problema del islote Tok y pasar por alto la liquidacion del pasado.
					
					Sobre todo, intenta crear deliberadamente los litigios territoriales para procurar el pretexto de reagresion en el tiempo de emergencia.
					
					Sea cual fuera el motivo, la insistencia japonesa en cuanto al islote Tok no vale ni un comino ni sera cumplida nunca.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben abandonar su ilusion irrisoria viendo correctamente la voluntad del pueblo coreano de defender a toda costa el islote Tok.
